comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw] No! There was a time in Austin's history when they set up a factory to make pedal cars / fairground ride cars using unemployed miners from South Wales (UK). That is why they look similar to contemporary Austin cars. See www.austinmemories.com/page66/page66.html . I can't find any more about these "parcels tractors", and wonder if they had another name?
